title: Overview of Different Reasoning Methods

definitions.0-shot CoT: Exemplars are automatically generated and tailored to each problem
definitions.Analogical Prompting: Exemplars are automatically generated and tailored to each problem

summary: The slide provides an overview of different reasoning methods in AI, including generic guidance reasoning, 0-shot CoT, and analogical prompting. It explains the need for labeled exemplars in reasoning and how exemplars are automatically generated and tailored to each problem. The slide also includes examples of model inputs and outputs for each method.
